markdownEnumDescriptions: Automatically archive unused tabs in all workspaces, except the workspaces present in the Excluded list.
Automatically archive unused tabs only in the workspaces present in the Included list.
tabarchive.activation.markdownDescription:
`everywhere-except-excluded`: automatically archive unused tabs in all workspaces, except the workspaces present in the Excluded list.

`nowhere-except-included`: automatically archive unused tabs only in the workspaces present in the Included list.

tabarchive.excludedWorkspaces.markdownDescription: List of workspaces in which unused tabs will not be automatically archived. Only used when `tabarchive.activation` is equal to `everywhere-except-excluded`.

tabarchive.includedWorkspaces.markdownDescription: List of workspaces in which unused tabs will be automatically archived. Only used when `tabarchive.activation` is equal to `nowhere-except-included`.

tabarchive.numberOfTabsInGroup.markdownDescription: Unused tabs will be archived only if the number of tabs in the group is greater than this number; enter `0` to archive all unused tabs.

tabarchive.tabAgeForAutomaticArchiving.markdownDescription: Number of hours after which an unused tab is automatically archived.
